name: Stalin Cats: Drive Through USSR
description:
If you like this game, please rate us on Google Play. Thank You!

Stalin Cats is an arcade race, which allows you to plunge into the atmosphere of an era of the developed socialism. Unique graphics, embodying the elements of Stalin's Baroque architecture, industrial landscapes and scenes of the Soviet nature combined with fascinating gameplay will not leave you indifferent.

Start the game as a bus driver. Avoid obstacles, which untiring cats cause you. Collect fuel and stars, setting new records.

Patience and perseverance will be rewarded – you can exchange collected stars for unique Soviet-era vehicles. Each vehicle has its own technical characteristics.

An exciting adventure through the world of the past

8 special vehicles

Original gameplay
 Unrivaled atmosphere of the era
Regular updates
